Module JBubbleBobble
Package editor.controller

Class ActionListenersManager

java.lang.Object
editor.controller.ActionListenersManager
public class ActionListenersManager extends Object
Manages the creation of action listeners for various UI components.

    • newGridButton

      public static ActionListener newGridButton(EditorPanel editorPanel, SpriteSelectionScrollPane selectionPane)
      Creates an ActionListener to create a new grid.
      Parameters:
      editorPanel - the panel where the grid is displayed
      selectionPane - the pane with sprite selection
      Returns:
      the ActionListener for creating a new grid

    • openGridButton

      Creates an ActionListener to open a grid.
      Parameters:
      levelSelectionPopup - the popup menu for level selection
      openGridButton - the button to trigger the popup
      Returns:
      the ActionListener for opening a grid

    • saveLevelButton

      Parameters:
      saveLevelPopup - the popup menu for saving the level
      saveLevelButton - the button to trigger the popup
      Returns:

    • levelHandlers

      public static ActionListener levelHandlers(LevelsPopUpMenu levelsPopUpMenu, String level, LevelsPopUpMenu.MenuType menuType, EditorFrame editorFrame)
      Creates an ActionListener to handle different level operations like open, save, or delete.
      Parameters:
      levelsPopUpMenu - the popup menu for level operations
      level - the level to operate on
      menuType - the type of operation (OPEN, SAVE, DELETE)
      editorFrame - the frame that displays the editor
      Returns:
      the ActionListener for handling the level operation

    • handleSaveLevel

      public static ActionListener handleSaveLevel(LevelsPopUpMenu lvlPopMen, int newLevelNumber, EditorFrame editorFrame)
      Creates an ActionListener to handle saving a level with a specific number.
      Parameters:
      lvlPopMen - the popup menu for level operations
      newLevelNumber - the new level number to save
      editorFrame - the frame that displays the editor
      Returns:
      the ActionListener for handling level saving

    • addSelectionButton

      public static ActionListener addSelectionButton(SpriteSelectionScrollPane spriteSelectionScrollPane, SelectionButton b)
      Creates an ActionListener to handle selection of a button in the sprite selection pane.
      Parameters:
      spriteSelectionScrollPane - the pane that contains sprite selection buttons
      b - the button to select
      Returns:
